another one gets ready to explode .
wow ! that was a good one .

output.sentences: This photo is no longer available on Flickr.
It seems that the second picture is related to the first, as it is also unavailable on Flickr.
I now realized, too late for my own good, that I had stumbled into a family reunion for pictures which had been removed from Flickr.
For reals though ,all of these photos either lost their usage rights or have been taken down from the website.
The final one is a smaller version of the Flickr notice.
